embeds.title: Headshot
embeds.description:
Common Attack / 1 :e_hermit: / The Hermit / Downfall

Deal 7 (9) damage.
**Dead On:** Deal double damage.

messages.content: it's a damage card
and not a bad one
Also don't vote for harden, it's going to be reworked this update
Headshot feels good
And that's a big achievement for a hermit card
Patch notes: headshot's damage is halved
if you insist
NO
DON'T DO THAT ACTUALLY
headshot is *the* act 1 early attack for Hermit, and it does its job decent enough
scales twice with strength, and is great with Snipe

Solid damage card, scales well into the later stages of the game with strength gain, vigor, and snipe. You do really want to have some ways to enable the dead on, since it's so important to the cards functionality as upfront damage. Fortunately, there are plenty of good options to do that, your starting covet already helps, and you can draft other card draw, energy generators, and concentrate. Make sure you are pretty good at enabling the dead on before upgrading, it's an above average upgrade with dead on, and a below average one without. Pairs exceptionally well with pen nib.
iirc the dead on effect doesn't actually double the damage, but adds a 1.0 multiplier, so if you double the dead on effect it triples the damage, not quadruples it
yeah
the best way to think of this card is "do 7 damage dead on attack again"
but doesn't actually attack again (relevant for spikers and ic3(hermit doesn't fight ic3))
so ig just spikers
well it's only relevant for IC 3 on A19+
because <Self-Forming Clay> is IC 3's A19 relic

embeds.title: Ironclad 2

Act 2 Boss

**Feeding Frenzy** - Ironclad's Reaper foes not **Exhaust** and targets ALL Mushrooms. When Ironclad kills a Mushroom, he gains 1 **Strength** :p_strength:.

**Cards**: Twin Strike, Feed, Clothesline, Fungus Among Us, Ghostly Armor+, Hemokinesis, Reaper, Defend, Haunted, Swift Strike, Heavy Blade, Clumsy, Bloodletting, Headbutt, Flame Barrier+, Inflame(+), Strike

**Unique Cards**:
Fungus Among Us - Kill all Mushrooms. Heal HP equal to their remaining HP. Summon two Mushrooms.

messages.content: I think the best way of explaining it that if you trigger dead on it plays as if you where in wrath, if you trigger dead on twice is plays as if you where in divinity
It just multiples whatever the actual damage delt would be by 2 or 3 without affecting anything else
there can still be value in talking about how it was before this update
I guess, I'd just rather discuss it after it's changed
hmm yes , objectively better strike #23245443
should it only be arguably better?
well it should be objectively better
that is its main purpose as a damage common
ehh it was a dumb joke
yeah, Snipe makes it do 21, which is insane lol
i think of it being Deal 7 damage Dead On double 7 damage
Guardian too
I love this card just generally it's real good
@Nic200 Huh, never realized it worked that way. I guess the wording is just a bit misleading then. Does pen nib quadruple the damage?
Yes, all other situations (afaik) properly double it
and this is why I treat the headshot conditional as "attack twice" and not "double damage"
since snipe exhausts now might just make it quadruple tbh
so does that mean Snipe+ isn't remove exhaust?
<cheat> <snipe>

embeds.title: Cheat
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 1 :e_hermit: / The Hermit / Downfall

Play one of the top 3 (5) cards in your draw pile.
**Dead On:** Also trigger its **Dead On** effect.

embeds.title: Snipe
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 0 :e_hermit: / The Hermit / Downfall

 ( **Concentrate** :p_concentration:. )
Your next **Dead On** effect this turn triggers twice.

messages.content: So what would happen if you played snipe twice and then played cheat on headshot?
Does snipe even stacks?
I'd imagine snipe would activate the first dead on effect twice, and the second one twice as well, the same way that double echo form doesn't play the first card 3 times
So would that quadruple headshot damage?
https://tenor.com/view/good-question-meme-shrek-gif-16886109
Well now you went and made me curious
But god headshot with bruise/glare will obliterate whatever you need it to
My main contribution to this server is asking questions no one is quite sure the answer for.

Which I now realize makes me wonder if you can multistack other cards
Answered one and got another the circle of life
most cards try to avoid multistacking in my experience
like echo form and doomsday
That makes sense
The odd thing is that it doesn't copy the card just the dead on effect
how does stacking snipe work?
does it effect the next 2 dead on cards?
or does it effect the next dead on card 3 times?
the same card
wait
nvm
Cheat procs dead on once, snipe procs again, snipe procs again
quadruples
